item.description:
Pub Crawl in Southie!!! ***Saturday, May 4th, 2013***

Themes: The One Fund and Cinco De Mayo!!!

 

Come join the Wedelns on a pub crawl through Southie to benefit the victims of the recent Boston Marathon bombings. The Wedelns are an outdoor sporting group and we want to support the victims of the recent tragedy. Let’s get together, Be Boston Strong and support the victims while getting some sorely needed social time.

If you’ve been to our past pub crawls, you know it’s a ton of fun. Don’t be shy, if you’ve never attended any of our events, this is a great opportunity to not only support the victims but also meet some great, down to earth, friendly people and find out more about what we awesome Wedelns are all about.

To participate in the crawl we ask that you donate $5-$10 as you arrive. All proceeds will go to The One Fund, Inc. In return, you will obtain a quality Be Strong Boston bracelet to wear for the crawl and in the future (1/2 blue with "Boston Strong"; 1/2 yellow with a heart).

The One Fund Boston, Inc., created by Massachusetts Governor Deval Patrick and Boston Mayor Tom Menino, serves to help the people most affected by the tragic events that occurred in Boston on April 15, 2013. For more information: onefundboston.org/

 

Crawl list:

1pm: Telegraph Hill, 289 Dorchester Street, South Boston, MA 02127 (617) 269-5200

2pm: Seapoint Bar & Grill, 367 East 8th Street, South Boston, MA 02127 (617) 268-1476 (Great food - extra time added to eat; $3.50 bottled import beers, $2.75-$3.5 for draft beers. Authentic Southie Irish Pub)

4pm: Touchie’s Shamrock Pub, 501 E 8th St, South Boston, MA 02127 (617) 268-0007 (Cash only!!! Authentic Southie Irish Cozy-Dive Pub)

5pm: The Junction, 110 Dorchester Street, South Boston, MA (617) 268-6429 (1/2 price on the entire food menu – extra time added to eat)

7pm: Blackthorn Pub, 471 W Broadway, South Boston, MA 02127 (617) 269-5510 (Cash only!!!! Traditional Irish pub with folks off the boat (OK, plane) to chat with)

8:30pm: Stats Bar & Grill, 77 Dorchester St, Boston, MA 02127 (617) 268-9300

9:30pm: The Playwright Bar, 658 E Broadway, South Boston, 02127 (617) 269-2537 (kitchen closes at 11pm, Great food and drink/beer choices. They have banana beer!)

***If traveling from the Redline, take Andrew Square and walk a few blocks up Dorchester STREET to the corner of Old Colony Ave and Dorchester STREET. Telegraph Hill is on your left just past this intersection on Dorchester STREET. Parking is available on Old Colony (best) and Dorchester STREET.***

****This is a joint event being hosted by The Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club as well as another fellow Mount Washington Ski Club. Guaranteed great time with these two clubs!!!*****
item.name: Southie Pub Crawl to support the recent bombing victims
